page.title: 04MEDIA
page.content: In this place,in 1985 we have found that practically every household owns at least one television set.To go with that TV,just over half of the population have a video .Approximatly one/third of the owners belong to video clubs and hire pre_recorded tapes.Colour TV's by a ratio of 6 to 1.The majority of homes also own a radio and tape recorder.Nearly 98% of homes buy a newspaper.The most popular papers are the{SUNDERLAND ECHO,DAILY {MIRROR,and DAILY MAIL.}The most popular magazines are{WOMANS Own and {WOMAN. Twice as many non fictional books are read compared to fictional books from the public libaries,whilst only 42% admit to buying books.In letter writring,social letters outnumber business letters by a ratio of 2 to 1.
